results.name: Nurse 4
results.reason: Best proximity to Beer Sheva (Beer Yaakov in Central Israel, closer than Tel Aviv/Netanya/Haifa), full availability overlap 06:00–22:00Z within 08:00–18:00Z partial-day coverage, high rating (4.63, 109 reviews), strong relevant inpatient-adjacent expertise (bedridden, assisted mobility, wheelchair, mobile). Services listed as General Care (no explicit Hospital Care match) but strongest overall fit.

results.name: Nurse 9
results.reason: Good rating (4.51, 106 reviews), full time window within 08:00–18:00Z, solid inpatient-relevant skills (bedridden, assisted mobility, mobile). Based in Tel Aviv–Yafo—moderate distance to Beer Sheva. Services are General Care, not Hospital Care.

results.name: Nurse 10
results.reason: Similar fit to Nurse 9 with strong skills (includes wheelchair care), good rating (4.43, 108 reviews), full availability overlap to 18:00Z. Location Bnei Brak—slightly farther than Tel Aviv but still reasonable. Services are General Care.

results.name: Nurse 7
results.reason: Strong expertise breadth (bedridden, wheelchair, assisted mobility, mobile), solid rating (4.41, 108 reviews), availability overlaps until 18:00Z. Based in Holon—comparable proximity to Tel Aviv area; good overall match despite General Care service label.

results.name: Nurse 2
results.reason: Good rating (4.43, 123 reviews), relevant inpatient-relevant skills (bedridden, assisted mobility, mobile), availability overlap to 18:00Z. Located in Holon; reasonable travel. Services are General Care, not Hospital Care.
